fields.name: Turquoise Double Room
fields.intro:
The Turquoise Double Room is a spacious room of 30m2 and is located on the ground.
The room has a bathroom ‘en-suite’ and a large window with direct access to the patio of a large terras.

As the name already suggest, the room has subtle touches of Turquoise, mainly noticeable in the typical Portuguese 'Azulejos' (tiles) in the bathroom.
fields.description:
The Turquoise Double Room is a spacious room of 30m2 and is located on the ground.
The room has a bathroom ‘en-suite’ and a large window with direct access to the patio of a large terras.

As the name already suggest, the room has subtle touches of Turquoise, mainly noticeable in the typical Portuguese 'Azulejos' (tiles) in the bathroom. 

In the room you can find some blankets to use on the patio if you want to enjoy the beautiful sunset accompanied with a glass of wine or a cup of tea. Right outside your room, you can find comfortable lounge chairs. You will also find an information box containing the tips and tricks about the Silver Coast. 

In the bathroom you can find various amenities from Rituals, a hairdryer and so on. 

Upon request a 3rd bed can be added in the room at an additional cost of €15 per night, including breakfast. Due to limited availability, it is currently not possible to book the extra bed online. Please send us an email or call us to request this.

fields.name: Amarelo Double Room
fields.intro:
The Amarelo Double Room is a spacious room of 30m2 and is located on the first floor. 
The room has a bathroom ‘en-suite’ and has the only access to a private terrace upstairs with a beautiful view over the surroundings. The perfect spot for a cup of tea to end the day.

As the name already suggest, the room has subtle touches of Amarelo (yellow), mainly noticeable in the typical Portuguese 'Azulejos' (tiles) in the bathroom.
fields.description:
The Amarelo Double Room is a spacious room of 30m2 and is located on the first floor. 
The room has a bathroom ‘en-suite’ and has the only access to a private terrace upstairs with a beautiful view over the surroundings. The perfect spot for a cup of tea to end the day.

As the name already suggeast, the room has subtle touches of Amarelo (yellow), mainly noticeable in the typical Portuguese 'Azulejos' (tiles) in the bathroom.

In the room you can find some blankets to use on the terrace if you want to enjoy the beautiful sunset accompanied with a glass of wine or a cup of tea. You will also find an information box containing the tips and tricks about the Silver Coast. 

In the bathroom you can find various amenities from Rituals, a hairdryer and so on. 

Upon request a 3rd bed can be added in the room at an additional cost of €15 per night, including breakfast. Due to limited availability, it is currently not possible to book the extra bed online. Please send us an email or call us to request this.

fields.name: Check in
fields.description:
Check in is between 15:00 and 22:00
Early check in available upon request

fields.description:

Late checkout available upon request
